greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Union of A057080 and A001090
comment: Column sums of shifted Pascal-like array:
Decimal expansion of ratio n/(n+1) is accumulation of Catalan numbers;(5 +/- sqrt(15)).
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,8,0,-1).
formula: For n odd a(n) = 10*a(n-1)- a(n-2), for n even a(n) = a(n-1) - a(n-2); with a(0) = 0, a(1) = 1.
results.author: _Mark Dols_, May 04 2010
